list_definition.definition: a small hard growth on the skin

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: He has a wart on his chin.

list_ex_of_english: All the other parties believe that this treaty—warts and all —represents a step forward.
Obviously, any attempt to index anything will have warts.
They are a microcosm of the community, warts and all.
We can only have a scheme of devolution, warts and all.
I would bring in the television cameras and let them show us warts and all.
What hope have we without some form of world organisation, with all its faults and warts?
The prize example of that is the treatment of simple warts by laser beams.
If we some saw some warts last week, don't forget that wider truth.
